statements: SELECT * FROM network_configuration_data_5g;
SELECT site_name, equipment_type FROM network_configuration_data_5g WHERE frequency_band = '5G';
SELECT id, site_name, equipment_type FROM network_configuration_data_5g WHERE bandwidth > 100;
SELECT equipment_type, frequency_band, bandwidth, tower_height FROM network_configuration_data_5g ORDER BY frequency_band DESC;
SELECT site_name, equipment_type, bandwidth FROM network_configuration_data_5g WHERE tower_height < 50.0;
SELECT * FROM network_configuration_data_5g WHERE id = 1;
SELECT site_name, equipment_type, frequency_band FROM network_configuration_data_5g WHERE bandwidth > 100;
SELECT site_name, equipment_type, frequency_band FROM network_configuration_data_5g WHERE tower_height BETWEEN 50.0 AND 100.0;
SELECT site_name, frequency_band, bandwidth FROM network_configuration_data_5g ORDER BY site_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM network_configuration_data_5g WHERE frequency_band = '5G' ORDER BY tower_height DESC;
SELECT * FROM network_configuration WHERE id = 1;
SELECT equipment_type, network_name FROM network_configuration WHERE frequency_band = '5G';
SELECT engineer_name, site_id FROM deployment_plan WHERE planned_start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM deployment_plan WHERE engineer_name LIKE '%Jones%';
SELECT id, equipment_type, network_name FROM network_configuration ORDER BY equipment_type DESC;
SELECT * FROM network_configuration WHERE network_name = 'GlobalNet' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT equipment_type, frequency_band FROM network_configuration WHERE equipment_type = 'Router' AND frequency_band = '5G' ORDER BY equipment_type ASC;
SELECT network_name FROM network_configuration WHERE frequency_band LIKE '4%' ORDER BY network_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM network_configuration WHERE equipment_type IS NOT NULL AND frequency_band IS NOT NULL;
SELECT engineer_name, planned_start_date FROM deployment_plan WHERE site_id = 1234;
SELECT * FROM network_configuration ORDER BY network_name DESC;
SELECT tower_id, location, power_consumption FROM cell_towers WHERE technology='5G' AND power_consumption > 1000;
SELECT device_name, type, data_rate FROM devices WHERE tower_id = 3 ORDER BY data_rate ASC;
SELECT network_name, frequency_band, bandwidth FROM network_configuration WHERE frequency_band LIKE '%5%' OR network_name LIKE 'Public%';
SELECT tower_id, location FROM cell_towers WHERE location LIKE '%City%' ORDER BY tower_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM network_configuration ORDER BY network_name DESC, id ASC
SELECT network_name, frequency_band, SUM(bandwidth) AS total_bandwidth FROM network_configuration GROUP BY network_name, frequency_band HAVING total_bandwidth > 100

SELECT devices.device_name, cell_towers.location, network_configuration.network_name FROM devices INNER JOIN cell_towers ON devices.tower_id = cell_towers.tower_id INNER JOIN network_configuration ON cell_towers.network_id = network_configuration.id WHERE devices.type = 'mobile'

SELECT network_name, COUNT(*) AS total_devices FROM network_configuration LEFT JOIN cell_towers ON network_configuration.id = cell_towers.network_id LEFT JOIN devices ON cell_towers.tower_id = devices.tower_id GROUP BY network_name
SELECT DISTINCT network_name, technology FROM network_configuration JOIN cell_towers ON network_configuration.id = cell_towers.network_id ORDER BY network_name, technology DESC
SELECT * FROM network_sites;
SELECT site_name, site_location FROM network_sites WHERE deployment_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM network_cells ORDER BY cell_type ASC;
SELECT site_name, cell_name, max_antennas FROM network_cells WHERE max_antennas > 5;
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type FROM network_equipment WHERE equipment_type = 'router';
SELECT * FROM network_sites
SELECT site_name, site_location FROM network_sites
SELECT * FROM network_cells ORDER BY cell_type DESC
SELECT site_id, site_name, deployment_date FROM network_sites WHERE site_location = 'New York'
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type FROM network_equipment JOIN network_antennas ON network_equipment.antenna_id = network_antennas.antenna_id
SELECT * FROM NetworkConfigurations;
SELECT network_name, network_type FROM NetworkConfigurations ORDER BY network_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_sites FROM Sites;
SELECT site_name, site_location, site_capacity FROM Sites WHERE site_status = 'Active';
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM Users WHERE user_type = 'Admin' ORDER BY user_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM NetworkConfigurations WHERE network_type = 'LAN'
SELECT network_name, network_capacity FROM NetworkConfigurations WHERE deployment_status = 'deployed' ORDER BY network_capacity DESC
SELECT site_name, site_location, site_capacity FROM Sites WHERE site_status = 'active' AND site_capacity > 100 ORDER BY site_capacity ASC
SELECT equipment_type, vendor_name FROM Equipment WHERE equipment_status = 'active' LIMIT 5
SELECT user_name, user_type FROM Users WHERE user_type = 'admin'
